name: Soldier Front 2: The Booster Package
detailed_description:
With this Booster Package, you'll enter the war zone with more than enough to kill off each of your enemies coming at you! Rise to greatness with your arsenal and Boosters

This package contains:

7 day Double up (100% EXP + 30% SP boost)
7 Day Delta Scout character (50% EXP + 30% SP boost) (yes, it stacks with the Double up!)
7 Day M4A1 Grom Rifle
7 Day ARM EO GROM Rifle
7 Day CT M200 GROM Sniper Rifle
7 Day Jerico 941 Pistol

How to redeem your item:

1. To view the key you need to redeem, right click on Soldier Front 2 in your Steam library, and then click on "view CD key".
2. Go to http://Soldierfront2.aeriagames.com/itemmall/free-rewards/gift/
3. Log in with your Aeria Games account
4. Type in your redemption key (CD key from Steam)
5. Click on Redeem
6. It’s done! Your item will be sent directly in game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7
  • Processor:Pentium 4 2.4GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVidia GeForce 6600 or better
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:3750 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
